original: Araṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Saraṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: saraṇam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Araṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na araṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Araṇo abyākato dhammo naaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo abyākato dhammo nasaraṇassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: araṇaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ na araṇassa na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ araṇaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare nissaye upanissaye purejāte vippayutte dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā anantare samanantare nissaye upanissaye purejāte vippayutte dve pe avigate dve
